author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: We LOVE Olive Garden for its delicious, comforting food. But we also know that making informed choices is super important! Whether you're counting calories, avoiding allergens, or eating gluten-free, this guide is for you. We've broken down the nutrition info to make it easy to find what you're looking for. Let's eat smart! ðŸ’ª

data.title: Gluten Sensitive Menu Options
categoriesFilter: Gluten Sensitive Options at Olive Garden

data.title: Your Nutrition & Allergen Questions, Answered! ðŸ¤”

items.question: Does Olive Garden have a gluten-free menu?
items.answer: YES! They have a great gluten-sensitive menu. You can get things like Gluten-Free Rotini pasta, Herb-Grilled Salmon, and the Famous House Salad (just ask for no croutons!). They've got you covered. âœ…

items.question: Where can I find the Olive Garden allergen menu?
items.answer: Olive Garden provides a detailed Allergen Guide that lists which dishes contain common allergens like dairy, nuts, etc. It's super helpful for making safe choices for you and your family! We recommend asking for the latest version at the restaurant.
